ygData.subject: Crystal Cavern
ygData.msgSnippet: My Halfling Druid will ding 42 on Thursday. I have him hunting Orcs in CC. I may stay there one more level, as it is profitable to hunt miners and sell the
ygData.messageBody:
My Halfling Druid will ding 42 on Thursday. I have him hunting Orcs in
CC. I may stay there one more level, as it is profitable to hunt
miners and sell the Velium. However, I am beginning to cast about for
my next adventure.

I go solo most of the time, and prefer that style of play. Not that I
don't enjoy the social elements of the game. Just don't want to depend
on groups. Kind of a loner, even in a game world.

What would be a good next step, seeking modest to good leveling, and
good to great cash? I hunt mostly blues, as I can take one easily, and
two with care, and three if I must (and none of them are casters). Any
suggestions as to where I go next?

Barto Proudfoot0
